name: Barrett Foster: Prologue
description:
Barrett Foster is a riddle game in which you will have to solve puzzles to progress and solve a personal investigation: The dramatic disappearance of Emma, a close friend of Barrett.

In a realistic universe and in first person view, you will have to explore emma’s home to discover all the secrets of her disappearance: Identify and analyze the objects present in the place but also activate mechanisms and secret codes to conduct the investigation!
Beware of noises and your gestures because they can and will have consequences!

.
